SEARCH

Class scenarioReader

java.lang.Object
scenarioReader
public class scenarioReader extends Object
Reads scenario and handles io, file reading, value and description errors in the scenario.
The user just writes the scenario ID in the text field of a little window.
Field 1: Scenario ID

    • readScenarioFile

      public static void readScenarioFile(int scenarioID) throws IOException, InvalidDescriptionException, InvalidValueException
      Reads a user-given scenario in a txt file.
      Line 1: Difficulty Level
      Line 2: Total number of bombs
      Line 3: Max available time
      Line 4: Super bomb
      Throws:
      IOException
      InvalidDescriptionException
      InvalidValueException
